thread.title: Plini: This Is The Best Guitar For Lazy Guitarists [News]
thread.title_full: Plini: This Is The Best Guitar For Lazy Guitarists [News]

title: Plini: This Is The Best Guitar For Lazy Guitarists [News]
text:
Posted 5 hours ago 7 
During a recent appearance on the No Guitar Is Safe Podcast , young guitar master Plini offered a nice little shameless plug for his signature Strandberg guitar, branding is the ideal choice for any lazy musician like him. 
He said: "I think A Little Thunder [pickup] is the second best thing you can buy after my signature guitar when it comes out - Strandberg Guitars dot com... 
"Ergonomically, yes - like I said, I'm a lazy person and I think this is the only guitar you can successfully be in bed with and it's still in playable position. 
"And the neck is like a patented, sort of trapezoidal-but-not-really thing that supports your thumb like always." 
You can check out Plini jamming the Strandberg below. 
Plini's full-length debut album " Handmade Cities " saw its release in August 2016, you can stream it in full below.
